Job Description

Reaction Biology Corp (RBC), a Malvern PA - based pharmaceutical research company, seeks a scientist with experience in biophysical analysis



Principal Responsibilities:

• With minimum of supervision, the candidate should be able to design, develop and execute a variety of biophysical based assays, including SPR, ITC, Thermal shift etc.

• Independently design and elucidate small molecules’ mechanism of actions towards a variety of biological targets.

• Interact directly with customers to understand their requests, trouble shoot assay problems and propose/pursue solutions.

• Screen and characterize small molecule compounds and determine the mode of compound action.

• Be able to utilize literature and internal data sets to design and test target modulation hypotheses.

•

Qualifications:

• MS or equivalent in biochemistry and biophysics or related discipline

• With 3+ years of working experience

• Ideal candidate would have demonstrated proficiency in assay development, optimization, and screening with small molecules.

• Attention to detail, and organization skills are critical

• Collaborative and proactive attitude with excellent written and oral communication skills

• Flexibility to accommodate to rapidly changing priorities and deadline

• Ability to work in a team-based environment


The work environment is casual; however, professional behavior, a collaborative attitude, attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are absolute requirements.

Finally, all employees are obligated to meet the highest standards with respect to honesty, accuracy, conflict of interest, intellectual property rights, confidentiality and respect for information sources and readers.
